name: Hell NO!
description:
You incarnate MörHyz, a demon that desperately wants to be human and will fight his way out, losing piece by piece his demon nature and becoming Maurice, a human wearing a fabulous white underpant and a gun (where did he hide the gun ? That's our little secret UwU)

We made this with Unity, Aseprite, Audacity and a lot of fun mixed with pain (just picture someone laughing and crying while not having enough sleep and too much coffee).

It was our contribution to the 2021 ENJAM, a Gamejam organised by the ENJAM's Student Office. We discovered a lot of stuff for the first time during this jam (including cheap pizzas Saturdays) so be comprehensive and have... fun ? Yeah let's call it that

THANKS to Studio Nyx and Romain Soulie for lending us their open space and providing free coffee 

Timothée LAMAZIERES - Awesome Project Manager

Romain LAVIDALIE - Certified Game Designer and NERF gun ruiner

Arthur ALAIN - "All the things that will kill you" developer

Tom ROUET - Controller Developer and Original Soundtrack

Florent BASCOUL - Artistic Direction and Coffee Drinker

Keyboard Controls :

Move with ZQSD or Arrows, when you can't fly anymore, jump with SPACE, Attack with 1 (the & one)
